info.author: Jordi Carrillo
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Busca is similar to the "search" tool in Gnome, but it will implement additional
features to manage efficiently your files in a fast and easy way.
As of version 0.1 it implements:

* Recursive search of files by regular expressions or suffixes
* Detailed information of every single file found
* Some statistics
* Ability to delete those files upon request
* Sort by filename or size. Very handy when you want to get rid of those big
files eating your whole filesystem
info.name: Busca
info.summary: Full featured Gnome file searching application
info.html_description:
Busca is similar to the "search" tool in Gnome, but it will implement additional
features to manage efficiently your files in a fast and easy way.
As of version 0.1 it implements:

* Recursive search of files by regular expressions or suffixes
* Detailed information of every single file found
* Some statistics
* Ability to delete those files upon request
* Sort by filename or size. Very handy when you want to get rid of those big
files eating your whole filesystem
